title.en: Chronicle of Meritorious Officials and Marquis of Gaozu

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：古者人臣功有五品，以德立宗廟定社稷曰勳，以言曰勞，用力曰功，明其等曰伐，積日曰閱。

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: In ancient times, ministers' achievements were ranked in five grades: establishing ancestral temples and stabilizing the state through virtue was called xun, through words was called lao, through physical effort was called gong, clarifying ranks was called fa, accumulating days was called yue.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: In ancient times, ministers' achievements were ranked in five grades: establishing ancestral temples and stabilizing the state through virtue was called xun, through words was called lao, through physical effort was called gong, clarifying ranks was called fa, accumulating days was called yue. (translated).

sentences.zh: 封爵之誓曰：「使河如帶，泰山若厲。

translations.literal: The oath for enfeoffing marquises said: 'May the Yellow River be as narrow as a belt, Mount Tai as easily crossed as a grindstone.
translations.idiomatic: The oath for enfeoffing marquises said: 'May the Yellow River be as narrow as a belt, Mount Tai as easily crossed as a grindstone. (translated).

sentences.zh: 國以永寧，爰及苗裔。」

translations.literal: May the state be eternally peaceful, extending to descendants.'
translations.idiomatic: May the state be eternally peaceful, extending to descendants.' (translated).

sentences.zh: 始未嘗不欲固其根本，而枝葉稍陵夷衰微也。

translations.literal: At first they did not fail to desire to strengthen their roots, but gradually the branches and leaves grew rampant and declined. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: At first they never failed to desire strengthening their foundations, but gradually the branches and leaves overgrew and declined.

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: In ancient times, ministers' achievements were ranked in five grades: establishing ancestral temples and stabilizing the state through virtue was called xun, through words was called lao, through physical effort was called gong, clarifying ranks was called fa, accumulating days was called yue. The oath for enfeoffing marquises said: 'May the Yellow River be as narrow as a belt, Mount Tai as easily crossed as a grindstone. May the state be eternally peaceful, extending to descendants.' At first they did not fail to desire to strengthen their roots, but gradually the branches and leaves grew rampant and declined.

sentences.zh: 余讀高祖侯功臣，察其首封，所以失之者，曰：異哉新聞！

translations.literal: I have read about Gaozu's meritorious officials who became marquises, and examining their initial enfeoffments and how they lost them, I say: How strange! Such different customs!
translations.idiomatic: I have read about Gaozu's meritorious officials who became marquises, and examining their initial enfeoffments and how they lost them, I say: How strange! Such different customs! (translated).

sentences.zh: 《書》曰「協和萬國」，遷于夏商，或數千歲。

translations.literal: The Book says 'harmonize the ten thousand states', moving from Xia to Shang, lasting several thousand years.
translations.idiomatic: The Book says 'harmonize the ten thousand states', moving from Xia to Shang, lasting several thousand years. (translated).

sentences.zh: 蓋周封八百，幽厲之後，見於春秋。

translations.literal: Zhou enfeoffed eight hundred, and after You and Li, they appear in the Spring and Autumn Annals. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Zhou enfeoffed eight hundred nobles, and after the reigns of You and Li, they appear in the Spring and Autumn Annals.

sentences.zh: 尚書有唐虞之侯伯，歷三代千有餘載，自全以蕃衛天子，豈非篤於仁義，奉上法哉？

translations.literal: The Documents has the marquises and earls of Tang and Yu, lasting three dynasties over a thousand years, preserving themselves to guard and protect the Son of Heaven—was this not devotion to benevolence and righteousness, revering and following the law?
translations.idiomatic: The Documents has the marquises and earls of Tang and Yu, lasting three dynasties over a thousand years, preserving themselves to guard and protect the Son of Heaven—was this not devotion to benevolence and righteousness, revering and following the law? (translated).

sentences.zh: 漢興，功臣受封者百有餘人。

translations.literal: When Han arose, over a hundred meritorious officials received enfeoffments. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: When Han arose, over a hundred meritorious officials received enfeoffments.

sentences.zh: 天下初定，故大城名都散亡，戶口可得而數者十二三，是以大侯不過萬家，小者五六百戶。

translations.literal: The realm had just been pacified, so large cities and famous towns were scattered and ruined, the households that could be counted were only twelve or thirteen percent, therefore large marquises received no more than ten thousand households, small ones five or six hundred households. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: The realm had just been pacified, so large cities and famous capitals lay scattered and ruined. The households that could be counted numbered only twelve or thirteen percent. Therefore large marquises received no more than ten thousand households, small ones five or six hundred.

sentences.zh: 後數世，民咸歸鄉里，戶益息，蕭、曹、絳、灌之屬或至四萬，小侯自倍，富厚如之。

translations.literal: After several generations, the people all returned to their native places, households increased, and the likes of Xiao, Cao, Jiang, Guan sometimes reached forty thousand, small marquises doubled, becoming wealthy like them. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: After several generations, the people all returned to their native villages, households increased, and figures like Xiao, Cao, Jiang, and Guan sometimes reached forty thousand households. Small marquises doubled their holdings, becoming wealthy like them.

sentences.zh: 子孫驕溢，忘其先，淫嬖。

translations.literal: Their descendants became arrogant and extravagant, forgetting their ancestors, indulging in debauchery. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Their descendants became arrogant and extravagant, forgetting their ancestors and indulging in debauchery.

sentences.zh: 至太初百年之閒，見侯五，餘皆坐法隕命亡國，秏矣。

translations.literal: By the time of Taichu, within a century, only five marquises remain visible, the rest all perished through law violations, losing their lives and states, gone. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: By the Taichu period, within a century, only five marquises remain visible; the rest all perished through violations of law, losing their lives and states—utterly gone.

sentences.zh: 罔亦少密焉，然皆身無兢兢於當世之禁云。

translations.literal: Perhaps they were somewhat lacking in caution, but all lacked vigilance regarding the prohibitions of their time. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Perhaps they were somewhat lacking in caution, but all failed to be vigilant regarding the prohibitions of their era.

translations.literal: I have read about Gaozu's meritorious officials who became marquises, and examining their initial enfeoffments and how they lost them, I say: How strange! Such different customs! The Book says 'harmonize the ten thousand states', moving from Xia to Shang, lasting several thousand years. Zhou enfeoffed eight hundred, and after You and Li, they appear in the Spring and Autumn Annals. The Documents has the marquises and earls of Tang and Yu, lasting three dynasties over a thousand years, preserving themselves to guard and protect the Son of Heaven—was this not devotion to benevolence and righteousness, revering and following the law? When Han arose, over a hundred meritorious officials received enfeoffments. The realm had just been pacified, so large cities and famous towns were scattered and ruined, the households that could be counted were only twelve or thirteen percent, therefore large marquises received no more than ten thousand households, small ones five or six hundred households. After several generations, the people all returned to their native places, households increased, and the likes of Xiao, Cao, Jiang, Guan sometimes reached forty thousand, small marquises doubled, becoming wealthy like them. Their descendants became arrogant and extravagant, forgetting their ancestors, indulging in debauchery. By the time of Taichu, within a century, only five marquises remain visible, the rest all perished through law violations, losing their lives and states, gone. Perhaps they were somewhat lacking in caution, but all lacked vigilance regarding the prohibitions of their time.

sentences.zh: 居今之世，志古之道，所以自鏡也，未必盡同。

translations.literal: Living in the present age, observing the ways of antiquity, one may use them as a mirror, but they are not necessarily all the same. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Living in the present age and observing the ways of antiquity provides a mirror for self-reflection, but they are not necessarily identical.

sentences.zh: 帝王者各殊禮而異務，要以成功為統紀，豈可緄乎？

translations.literal: Emperors and kings each had different rituals and different affairs, but essentially they used success as their guiding principle—how could they be bound together?
translations.idiomatic: Emperors and kings each had different rituals and different affairs, but essentially they used success as their guiding principle—how could they be bound together? (translated).

sentences.zh: 觀所以得尊寵及所以廢辱，亦當世得失之林也，何必舊聞？

translations.literal: Observing what brought honor and favor and what brought disgrace and humiliation, these are also the forest of gains and losses in their times, why must it be ancient hearsay?
translations.idiomatic: Observing what brought honor and favor and what brought disgrace and humiliation, these are also the forest of gains and losses in their times, why must it be ancient hearsay? (translated).

sentences.zh: 於是謹其終始，表其文，頗有所不盡本末；

translations.literal: Therefore I have carefully recorded their beginnings and ends, tabled their writings, though somewhat incomplete in roots and branches;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore I have carefully recorded their beginnings and ends, tabled their writings, though somewhat incomplete in roots and branches; (translated).

sentences.zh: 著其明，疑者闕之。

translations.literal: Recorded what was clear, left doubtful matters blank. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: I recorded what was clear, and left doubtful matters blank.

sentences.zh: 後有君子，欲推而列之，得以覽焉。

translations.literal: If later gentlemen wish to investigate and list them, they may peruse this. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: If future gentlemen wish to investigate and arrange them, they may peruse this work.

translations.literal: Living in the present age, observing the ways of antiquity, one may use them as a mirror, but they are not necessarily all the same. Emperors and kings each had different rituals and different affairs, but essentially they used success as their guiding principle—how could they be bound together? Observing what brought honor and favor and what brought disgrace and humiliation, these are also the forest of gains and losses in their times, why must it be ancient hearsay? Therefore I have carefully recorded their beginnings and ends, tabled their writings, though somewhat incomplete in roots and branches; Recorded what was clear, left doubtful matters blank. If later gentlemen wish to investigate and list them, they may peruse this.

cells.content: 以舍人從起碭，以刺客將，入漢，以都尉擊項羽滎陽，絕甬道，擊殺追卒功，侯。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising in Dang, as assassin general, entered Han, as commandery captain attacked Xiang Yu at Xingyang, cut off transport road, attacked and killed pursuing troops with merit, became marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As retainer followed uprising in Dang, as assassin general, entered Han, as commandery captain attacked Xiang Yu at Xingyang, cut off transport road, attacked and killed pursuing troops with merit, became marquis. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年十二月甲申，壯侯陳濞元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis Zhuang Chen Pi year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis Zhuang Chen Pi year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: 8th
cells.idiomatic: 8th (translated).

cells.content: 十八。五。後三年，侯始元年。
cells.literal: Eighteen. Five. After year 3, Marquis Shi year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Eighteen. Five. After year 3, Marquis Shi year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 四。前五年，侯始有罪，國除。。塞二。中五年，復封始。。後元年，始有罪，國除。
cells.literal: Four. Year 5 BCE, Marquis Shi committed crime, state abolished. Sai two. Zhong year 5, re-enfeoffed Shi. After year 1, Shi committed crime, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Four. Year 5 BCE, Marquis Shi committed crime, state abolished. Sai two. Zhong year 5, re-enfeoffed Shi. After year 1, Shi committed crime, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: Nineteen
cells.idiomatic: Nineteen (translated).

cells.literal: Qu Ni.
cells.idiomatic: Qu Ni. (translated).

cells.content: 以故楚都尉，漢王二年初從修武，為都尉，遷為護軍中尉；出六奇計，定天下，侯，五千戶。
cells.literal: As former Chu commandery captain, Han King year 2 initially followed Xiuyu, became commandery captain, promoted to Protector Army Commandant; put forth six extraordinary strategies, pacified the realm, became marquis, 5,000 households.
cells.idiomatic: As former Chu commandery captain, Han King year 2 initially followed Xiuyu, became commandery captain, promoted to Protector Army Commandant; put forth six extraordinary strategies, pacified the realm, became marquis, 5,000 households. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年十二月甲申，獻侯陳平元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis Xian Chen Ping year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis Xian Chen Ping year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: Seven. In his fifth year, became Left Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. In his fifth year, became Left Chancellor. (translated).

cells.content: 八。其元年，徙為右丞相；後專為丞相，相孝文二年。
cells.literal: Eight. In his first year, relocated to become Right Chancellor; later solely Chancellor, Chancellor for Emperor Wen year 2.
cells.idiomatic: Eight. In his first year, relocated to become Right Chancellor; later solely Chancellor, Chancellor for Emperor Wen year 2. (translated).

cells.content: 二。二。三年，恭侯買元年。。十九。五年，簡侯悝元年。
cells.literal: Two. Two. Year 3, Marquis Gong Mai year 1. Nineteen. Year 5, Marquis Jian Kui year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Two. Year 3, Marquis Gong Mai year 1. Nineteen. Year 5, Marquis Jian Kui year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: Four. Twelve. Year 5, Marquis He year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Four. Twelve. Year 5, Marquis He year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 十。元光五年，侯何坐略人妻，棄市，國除。
cells.literal: Ten. Yuanguang year 5, Marquis He convicted of raping someone's wife, executed in market, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Ten. Yuanguang year 5, Marquis He convicted of raping someone's wife, executed in market, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: Forty-seven
cells.idiomatic: Forty-seven (translated).

cells.literal: Tangyi.
cells.idiomatic: Tangyi. (translated).

cells.content: 以自定東陽，為將，屬項梁，為楚柱國。四歲，項羽死，屬漢，定豫章、浙江都浙自立為王壯息，侯，千八百戶。復相楚元王十一年。
cells.literal: As self-established Dongyang, became general, attached to Xiang Liang, became Chu Zhuguo. Four years, Xiang Yu died, attached to Han, pacified Yuzhang, Zhejiang capital Zhe self-established as King Zhuang Xi, became marquis, 1,800 households. Again Chancellor for King Yuan of Chu year 11.
cells.idiomatic: As self-established Dongyang, became general, attached to Xiang Liang, became Chu Zhuguo. Four years, Xiang Yu died, attached to Han, pacified Yuzhang, Zhejiang capital Zhe self-established as King Zhuang Xi, became marquis, 1,800 households. Again Chancellor for King Yuan of Chu year 11. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年十二月甲申，安侯陳嬰元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis An Chen Ying year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 12 Jia Shen day, Marquis An Chen Ying year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: Four. Four. Year 5, Marquis Gong Lu year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Four. Four. Year 5, Marquis Gong Lu year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 二。二十一。三年，夷侯午元年。
cells.literal: Two. Twenty-one. Year 3, Marquis Yi Wu year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Twenty-one. Year 3, Marquis Yi Wu year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: Sixteen
cells.idiomatic: Sixteen (translated).

cells.content: 十一。元光六年，季須元年。。十三。元鼎元年，侯須坐母長公主卒，未除服姦，兄弟爭財，當死，自殺，國除。
cells.literal: Eleven. Yuanguang year 6, Marquis Ji Xu year 1. Thirteen. Yuanding year 1, Marquis Xu convicted of committing adultery with Princess Chang before mourning period ended, brothers disputed property, sentenced to death, committed suicide, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Eleven. Yuanguang year 6, Marquis Ji Xu year 1. Thirteen. Yuanding year 1, Marquis Xu convicted of committing adultery with Princess Chang before mourning period ended, brothers disputed property, sentenced to death, committed suicide, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: Eighty-six
cells.idiomatic: Eighty-six (translated).

cells.literal: Zhou Lü.
cells.idiomatic: Zhou Lü. (translated).

cells.content: 以呂后兄初起以客從，入漢為侯。還定三秦，將兵先入碭。漢王之解彭城，往從之，復發兵佐高祖定天下，功侯。
cells.literal: As Lü Empress's brother initially rose as guest follower, entered Han and became marquis. Returned and pacified the Three Qins, led troops first entering Dang. When Han King retreated from Pengcheng, went to follow him, again raised troops to assist Gaozu in pacifying the realm, meritorious service led to marquisate.
cells.idiomatic: As Lü Empress's brother initially rose as guest follower, entered Han and became marquis. Returned and pacified the Three Qins, led troops first entering Dang. When Han King retreated from Pengcheng, went to follow him, again raised troops to assist Gaozu in pacifying the realm, meritorious service led to marquisate. (translated).

cells.content: 三。六年正月丙戌，令武侯呂澤元年。。四。九年，子台封酈侯元年。
cells.literal: Three. Year 6 month 1 Bing Xu day, Marquis Wu Lü Ze year 1. Four. Year 9, son Tai enfeoffed as Marquis of Li year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Three. Year 6 month 1 Bing Xu day, Marquis Wu Lü Ze year 1. Four. Year 9, son Tai enfeoffed as Marquis of Li year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: Jiancheng.
cells.idiomatic: Jiancheng. (translated).

cells.content: 以呂后兄初起以客從，擊三秦。漢王入漢，而釋之還豐沛，奉衛呂宣王、太上皇。天下已平，封釋之為建成侯。
cells.literal: As Lü Empress's brother initially rose as guest follower, attacked the Three Qins. When Han King entered Han, Shi was released to return to Feng and Pei, to serve and protect King Xuan of Lü and the Supreme Emperor. After the realm was pacified, Shi was enfeoffed as Marquis of Jiancheng.
cells.idiomatic: As Lü Empress's brother initially rose as guest follower, attacked the Three Qins. When Han King entered Han, Shi was released to return to Feng and Pei, to serve and protect King Xuan of Lü and the Supreme Emperor. After the realm was pacified, Shi was enfeoffed as Marquis of Jiancheng. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙戌，康侯釋之元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Xu day, Marquis Kang Shi Zhi year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Xu day, Marquis Kang Shi Zhi year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 二。五。三年，侯則元年。有罪。
cells.literal: Two. Five. Year 3, Marquis Ze year 1. Committed crime.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Five. Year 3, Marquis Ze year 1. Committed crime. (translated).

cells.content: 胡陵七。元年，五月丙寅，封則弟大中大夫呂祿元年。。七年，祿為趙王，國除。追尊康侯為昭王。祿以趙王謀為不善，大臣誅祿，遂滅呂。
cells.literal: Huling seven. Year 1, month 5 Bing Yin day, enfeoffed Ze's younger brother Grand Master of the Court Lü Lu year 1. Year 7, Lu became King of Zhao, state abolished. Posthumously honored Marquis Kang as King Zhao. Lu as King of Zhao plotted evil, ministers executed Lu, thus extinguished Lü clan.
cells.idiomatic: Huling seven. Year 1, month 5 Bing Yin day, enfeoffed Ze's younger brother Grand Master of the Court Lü Lu year 1. Year 7, Lu became King of Zhao, state abolished. Posthumously honored Marquis Kang as King Zhao. Lu as King of Zhao plotted evil, ministers executed Lu, thus extinguished Lü clan. (translated).

cells.literal: Liu.
cells.idiomatic: Liu. (translated).

cells.content: 以廄將從起下邳，以韓申徒下韓國，言上張旗志，秦王恐，降，解上與項羽之纳，為漢王請漢中地，常計謀平天下，侯，萬戶。
cells.literal: As carriage commander followed uprising in Xiapi, with Han Xin as follower conquered Han state, spoke to superiors about raising flags to show intent, Qin King feared, surrendered, resolved superiors' alliance with Xiang Yu, for Han King requested Hanzhong lands, constantly planned to pacify the realm, became marquis, 10,000 households.
cells.idiomatic: As carriage commander followed uprising in Xiapi, with Han Xin as follower conquered Han state, spoke to superiors about raising flags to show intent, Qin King feared, surrendered, resolved superiors' alliance with Xiang Yu, for Han King requested Hanzhong lands, constantly planned to pacify the realm, became marquis, 10,000 households. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，文成侯張良。元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Wen Cheng Zhang Liang year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Wen Cheng Zhang Liang year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: Two. Six. Year 3, Buyi year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Six. Year 3, Buyi year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 四。五年，侯不疑坐與門大夫謀殺故楚內史，當死，贖為城旦，國除。
cells.literal: Four. Year 5, Marquis Buyi convicted of plotting with gate official to kill former Chu Interior Minister, sentenced to death, redeemed to become city wall laborer, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Four. Year 5, Marquis Buyi convicted of plotting with gate official to kill former Chu Interior Minister, sentenced to death, redeemed to become city wall laborer, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: Sixty-two
cells.idiomatic: Sixty-two (translated).

cells.literal: Sheyang.
cells.idiomatic: Sheyang. (translated).

cells.content: 兵初起，與諸侯共擊秦，為楚左令尹，漢王與項羽有纳於鴻門，項伯纏解難，以破羽纏嘗有功，封射陽侯。
cells.literal: Troops initially rose, together with various lords attacked Qin, became Chu Left Lingyin, Han King and Xiang Yu had alliance at Hongmen, Xiang Bo mediated to resolve difficulty, with merit in defeating Yu Bo was once rewarded, enfeoffed as Marquis of Sheyang.
cells.idiomatic: Troops initially rose, together with various lords attacked Qin, became Chu Left Lingyin, Han King and Xiang Yu had alliance at Hongmen, Xiang Bo mediated to resolve difficulty, with merit in defeating Yu Bo was once rewarded, enfeoffed as Marquis of Sheyang. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，侯項纏元年。賜姓劉氏。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Xiang Bo year 1. Granted surname Liu.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Xiang Bo year 1. Granted surname Liu. (translated).

cells.content: 二。三年，侯纏卒。嗣子睢有罪，國除。
cells.literal: Two. Year 3, Marquis Bo died. Successor son Sui committed crime, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Year 3, Marquis Bo died. Successor son Sui committed crime, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: Zan.
cells.idiomatic: Zan. (translated).

cells.content: 以客初起從入漢，為丞相，備守蜀及關中，給軍食，佐上定諸侯，為法令，立宗廟，侯，八千戶。
cells.literal: As guest initially rose followed into Han, became Chancellor, prepared defense of Shu and Guanzhong, supplied army provisions, assisted superiors in pacifying various lords, established laws and regulations, established ancestral temples, became marquis, 8,000 households.
cells.idiomatic: As guest initially rose followed into Han, became Chancellor, prepared defense of Shu and Guanzhong, supplied army provisions, assisted superiors in pacifying various lords, established laws and regulations, established ancestral temples, became marquis, 8,000 households. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，文終侯蕭何元年。元年，為丞相；九年，為相國。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Wen Zhong Xiao He year 1. Year 1, became Chancellor; year 9, became Chancellor.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Wen Zhong Xiao He year 1. Year 1, became Chancellor; year 9, became Chancellor. (translated).

cells.literal: Two. Five. Year 3, Marquis Ai Lu year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Five. Year 3, Marquis Ai Lu year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 一。七。二年，懿侯同元年。同，祿弟。
cells.literal: One. Seven. Year 2, Marquis Yi Tong year 1. Tong, Lu's younger brother.
cells.idiomatic: One. Seven. Year 2, Marquis Yi Tong year 1. Tong, Lu's younger brother. (translated).

cells.content: 筑陽十九。元年，同有罪，封何小子延元年。。一。後四年，煬侯遺元年。。三。後五年，侯則元年。
cells.literal: Zhuyang nineteen. Year 1, Tong committed crime, enfeoffed He's young son Yan year 1. One. After four years, Marquis Yang Yi year 1. Three. After five years, Marquis Ze year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Zhuyang nineteen. Year 1, Tong committed crime, enfeoffed He's young son Yan year 1. One. After four years, Marquis Yang Yi year 1. Three. After five years, Marquis Ze year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 一。有罪。。武陽七。前二年，封煬侯弟幽侯嘉元年。。八。中二年，侯勝元年。
cells.literal: One. Committed crime. Wuyang seven. Year 2 BCE, enfeoffed Marquis Yang's younger brother Marquis You Jia year 1. Eight. Zhong year 2, Marquis Sheng year 1.
cells.idiomatic: One. Committed crime. Wuyang seven. Year 2 BCE, enfeoffed Marquis Yang's younger brother Marquis You Jia year 1. Eight. Zhong year 2, Marquis Sheng year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 十。元朔二年，侯勝坐不敬，絕。。三。元狩三年，封何曾孫恭侯慶元年。。酇三。元狩六年，侯壽成元年。。十。元封四年，壽成為太常，犧牲不如令，國除。
cells.literal: Ten. Yuanshuo year 2, Marquis Sheng convicted of disrespect, extinct. Three. Yuanshou year 3, enfeoffed He's great-grandson Marquis Gong Qing year 1. Zan three. Yuanshou year 6, Marquis Shou Cheng year 1. Ten. Yuanfeng year 4, Shou Cheng as Grand Master of Ceremonies, sacrifices not according to regulations, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Ten. Yuanshuo year 2, Marquis Sheng convicted of disrespect, extinct. Three. Yuanshou year 3, enfeoffed He's great-grandson Marquis Gong Qing year 1. Zan three. Yuanshou year 6, Marquis Shou Cheng year 1. Ten. Yuanfeng year 4, Shou Cheng as Grand Master of Ceremonies, sacrifices not according to regulations, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: 1st
cells.idiomatic: 1st (translated).

cells.literal: Zhou
cells.idiomatic: Zhou (translated).

cells.content: 以將軍從起岐，攻長社以南，別定漢中及蜀，定三秦，擊項羽，侯，四千八百戶。
cells.literal: As general followed uprising at Qi, attacked south of Changshe, separately pacified Hanzhong and Shu, pacified Three Qins, attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, 4,800 households
cells.idiomatic: As general followed uprising at Qi, attacked south of Changshe, separately pacified Hanzhong and Shu, pacified Three Qins, attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, 4,800 households (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，景侯酈商元年。
cells.literal: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Jing Marquis Li Shang year 1
cells.idiomatic: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Jing Marquis Li Shang year 1 (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: 8th
cells.idiomatic: 8th (translated).

cells.literal: 23rd. Year 1, Marquis Ji year 1
cells.idiomatic: 23rd. Year 1, Marquis Ji year 1 (translated).

cells.content: 九。有罪。。繆七。中三年，封商他子靖侯堅元年。
cells.literal: 9th. Had crime. 7th. Zhong year 3, enfeoffed Shang's other son Jing Marquis Jian year 1
cells.idiomatic: 9th. Had crime. 7th. Zhong year 3, enfeoffed Shang's other son Jing Marquis Jian year 1 (translated).

cells.content: 九。元光四年，康侯遂元年。。五。元朔三年，侯宗元年。。十一。元鼎二年，侯終根元年。。二十八。後元二年，侯終根坐咒詛誅，國除。
cells.literal: 9th. Yuan Guang year 4, Kang Marquis Sui year 1. 5th. Yuan Shuo year 3, Marquis Zong year 1. 11th. Yuan Ding year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen year 1. 28th. Hou Yuan year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen convicted of cursing, executed, state abolished
cells.idiomatic: 9th. Yuan Guang year 4, Kang Marquis Sui year 1. 5th. Yuan Shuo year 3, Marquis Zong year 1. 11th. Yuan Ding year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen year 1. 28th. Hou Yuan year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen convicted of cursing, executed, state abolished (translated).

cells.literal: 6th
cells.idiomatic: 6th (translated).

cells.literal: Jiang
cells.idiomatic: Jiang (translated).

cells.content: 以中涓從起沛，至霸上，為侯。定三秦，食邑，為將軍。入漢，定隴西，擊項羽，守嶢關，定泗水、東海。八千一百戶。
cells.literal: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Pei, reached Baxia, made marquis. Pacified Three Qins, had fief, became general. Entered Han, pacified Longxi, attacked Xiang Yu, guarded Yao Pass, pacified Si River and Donghai. 8,100 households
cells.idiomatic: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Pei, reached Baxia, made marquis. Pacified Three Qins, had fief, became general. Entered Han, pacified Longxi, attacked Xiang Yu, guarded Yao Pass, pacified Si River and Donghai. 8,100 households (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，武侯周勃元年。
cells.literal: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Zhou Bo year 1
cells.idiomatic: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Zhou Bo year 1 (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
cells.idiomatic: 7th (translated).

cells.literal: 8th. His fourth year became Grand Commandant
cells.idiomatic: 8th. His fourth year became Grand Commandant (translated).

cells.content: 十一。元年，為右丞相，三年，免。復為丞相。。六。十二年，侯勝之元年。。條六。後二年，封勃子亞夫元年。
cells.literal: Eleven. Year 1, became Right Chancellor, year 3, dismissed. Again became Chancellor. Six. Year 12, Marquis Sheng Zhi year 1. Tiao six. After year 2, enfeoffed Bo's son Yafu year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Eleven. Year 1, became Right Chancellor, year 3, dismissed. Again became Chancellor. Six. Year 12, Marquis Sheng Zhi year 1. Tiao six. After year 2, enfeoffed Bo's son Yafu year 1. (translated).

cells.content: 十三。其三年，為太尉；七年，為丞相。有罪，國除。。平曲三。後元年，封勃子恭侯堅元年。
cells.literal: 13th. His third year became Grand Commandant; seventh year became Chancellor. Had crime, state abolished. 3rd. Hou year 1, enfeoffed Bo's son Gong Marquis Jian year 1
cells.idiomatic: 13th. His third year became Grand Commandant; seventh year became Chancellor. Had crime, state abolished. 3rd. Hou year 1, enfeoffed Bo's son Gong Marquis Jian year 1 (translated).

cells.content: 十六。元朔五年，侯建德元年。。十二。元鼎五年，侯建德坐酎金，國除。
cells.literal: 16th. Yuan Shuo year 5, Marquis Jian De year 1. 12th. Yuan Ding year 5, Marquis Jian De convicted of tribute gold, state abolished
cells.idiomatic: 16th. Yuan Shuo year 5, Marquis Jian De year 1. 12th. Yuan Ding year 5, Marquis Jian De convicted of tribute gold, state abolished (translated).

cells.literal: 4th
cells.idiomatic: 4th (translated).

cells.literal: Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Wu Yang (translated).

cells.content: 以舍人起沛，從至霸上，為侯。入漢，定三秦，為將軍，擊項籍，再益封。從破燕，執韓信，侯，五千戶。
cells.literal: As retainer rose at Pei, followed to Baxia, made marquis. Entered Han, pacified Three Qins, became general, attacked Xiang Ji, twice increased enfeoffment. Followed in breaking Yan, captured Han Xin, marquis, 5,000 households
cells.idiomatic: As retainer rose at Pei, followed to Baxia, made marquis. Entered Han, pacified Three Qins, became general, attacked Xiang Ji, twice increased enfeoffment. Followed in breaking Yan, captured Han Xin, marquis, 5,000 households (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，武侯樊噲元年。其七年，為將軍、相國三月。
cells.literal: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Fan Kuai year 1. His seventh year became general, Chancellor for three months
cells.idiomatic: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Fan Kuai year 1. His seventh year became general, Chancellor for three months (translated).

cells.content: 六。一。七年，侯伉元年。呂須子。
cells.literal: 6th. 1st. Year 7, Marquis Kang year 1. Lu Xu's son
cells.idiomatic: 6th. 1st. Year 7, Marquis Kang year 1. Lu Xu's son (translated).

cells.literal: 8th. Convicted of Lu clan crimes, clan exterminated
cells.idiomatic: 8th. Convicted of Lu clan crimes, clan exterminated (translated).

cells.content: 二十三。元年，封樊噲子荒侯市人元年。
cells.literal: 23rd. Year 1, enfeoffed Fan Kuai's son Huang Marquis Shi Ren year 1
cells.idiomatic: 23rd. Year 1, enfeoffed Fan Kuai's son Huang Marquis Shi Ren year 1 (translated).

cells.content: 六。七年，侯它廣元年。。六。中六年，侯它廣非市人子，國除。
cells.literal: Six. Year 7, Marquis Tuo Guang year 1. Six. Zhong year 6, Marquis Tuo Guang not market person's son, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Six. Year 7, Marquis Tuo Guang year 1. Six. Zhong year 6, Marquis Tuo Guang not market person's son, state abolished. (translated).

cells.literal: 5th
cells.idiomatic: 5th (translated).

cells.literal: Yingyin.
cells.idiomatic: Yingyin. (translated).

cells.content: 以中涓從起碭，至霸上，為昌文君。入漢，定三秦，食邑。以車騎將軍屬淮陰，定齊、淮南及下邑，殺項籍，侯，五千戶。
cells.literal: As attendant followed uprising in Dang, to Baxiang, became Changwen Jun. Entered Han, pacified Three Qins, received fief. As chariot cavalry general attached to Han Xin, pacified Qi, Huainan and Xia Yi, killed Xiang Ji, became marquis, 5,000 households.
cells.idiomatic: As attendant followed uprising in Dang, to Baxiang, became Changwen Jun. Entered Han, pacified Three Qins, received fief. As chariot cavalry general attached to Han Xin, pacified Qi, Huainan and Xia Yi, killed Xiang Ji, became marquis, 5,000 households. (translated).

cells.content: 七。六年正月丙午，懿侯灌嬰元年。
cells.literal: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Yi Guan Ying year 1.
cells.idiomatic: Seven. Year 6 month 1 Bing Wu day, Marquis Yi Guan Ying year 1. (translated).

cells.literal: 7th
